body:
This is fucked up to us,

But pretty much a common thing in the past. Glad we're not in the past anymore, ain't we?

Protocol dictates that the man's family would send her an escort to protect her from bandits on the way to her betrothed's lands. Instead, like an idiot, she decided to make the journey in haste with only a handful of her guards. She was literally asking to get waylaid by bandits.
